title: Older iSight cable with newer board?
message:
Can the older/smaller iSight cables be adapted to the newer/larger board connectors?
I have two cases where I’d like to see if this can be done. A 2014 MacBook Air 13” 820-3437 with a 2012 display. (Needs lengthened too). Also, a late 2013 MacBook Pro 15” with a 2012/e2013 display. 

Tried to search but could find anything.
